name: Momentum (itch) (Pavlicek69)
description:
Momentum is an action 3D platformer where the player takes control of a rocket ship and has to navigate through muliple levels

Screenshots

Would love to hear your feedback!
Because this is my first game i'm expecting there will be a lot of bugs that i didn't notice or game design decisions that you don't think are good. I always try to get better at game design so any feedback here in comments or to my mail pavel.vavre@gmail.com will be welcomed.

If you liked this game please consider sharing it with your friends!

- Keyboard:

           Rotate rocket: A/D

           Thrust: Space bar

- Gamepad:

            Thrust: Left Trigger
